paragraphs.text: Thespidae is a family of Neotropical insects in the order Mantodea.[1][2][3][4]  Following a major revision of this order in 2019, the old-world subfamilies Haaniinae and Hoplocoryphinae, previously placed here, have been upgraded to family level.

paragraphs.title: Subfamilies and genera
paragraphs.text: The following taxa are recognised in the family Thespidae:[5]
